A list of the Battlecard Items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): FAQ: A list of the Battlecard Items
By Eagle_Fierce on Wednesday, April 26, 2000 - 07:52 pm:

For Battle
1downerAffects enemy- takes away 1 gut from monster
2downer sAffects enemy- takes away 2 guts from monster
3downer xAffects enemy- takes away 3 guts from monster
4mo downerAffects enemy- takes away 1 gut from 2 monsters
5downer lAffects enemy- takes away 2 guts from 2 monsters
6aldownerAffects enemy- takes away 1 gut from all monsters
7aldowner gAffects enemy- takes away 2 guts from all monsters
8upperBenefits own monster- gives 1 gut to monster
9upper sBenefits own monster- gives 2 guts to monster
10upper xBenefits own monster- gives 3 lives to monster
11mo upperBenefits own monster- gives life to 2 monsters
12mo upper 1Benefits own monster- gives 2 lives to 2 monsters
13alupperBenefits own monster- gives life to all monsters
14alupper sBenefits own monster- gives 2 lives to 2 monsters
15mischiefswaps/shuffles the life of all monsters
16launchergives character a swift start
17hypnosismakes character toss 5 cards from the enemy's or their own deck
18coinheadsa trick coin with heads on both sides
19cointailsa trick coin with tails on both sides
20itemeatertakes away the value of enemies item
21mirrorreflects the value of enemies items


Equipment
22fit-shoesbroken-in shoes
23rollerskatesincreases mobility
24gumbootsrubber boots that shield sheild character from elecrtic flow
25airkickshi-tech sneakers capable of leaping high over holes
26dragonsoleslegendary martial artist shoes that handle flame with ease
27ironsolesiron shoes - so hard that a needle won't even go through
28sandalsmake a funny noise - funny but a bit embarassing
29flybootsallows you to keep card/counter when a match is lost
30ringshoes??
31scoopworn-out shovel that allows you to dig through dirt rooms
32coinsackhandy coin purse -allows you to collect lots of miracle coins
33teamboxa box to put away teams to save them



Dungeon
34candaroperope allows you to reach ground level in one shot
35sis lenselens that displays the map of the current level
36fat lenselense that shows all the guardians of the level
37holy waterwater from the shrine that gets rid of the guardians on the screen
38God waterwater that gets rid of all the guardians on the level
39rich badgegives you 1 extra dungeon counter
40luxe badgegives you 2 extra dungeon counters
41mirrorclereplicates items -though you won't know which item it will copy


Event items
42milk stuffa drink to feed monsters
43holy cointurns into an item if you throw it in certain places
44featherlegendary Phoenix feather you can trade for very rare cards



Town Items
45old Paintused to replicate cards
46disk itemplace it in a spot where a disk is missing
